des: "This frozen margarita is a berrilicious treat.  Sweet, cool and goes down smooth.  Great for unwinding on a hot day or any festive occasion."
ins: Place the ice into a blender pitcher. Pour in the tequila, triple sec, and orange juice. Add the strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and sugar. Cover, and blend until the mixture is smooth, or to your desired consistency. Pour into chilled glasses to serve.
